question: Tell me about a time you had to learn something quickly for a project.
Describe a situation where you had to work with a difficult teammate.
Tell me about a time you went above and beyond what was expected of you.
Describe a time you received critical feedback and how you responded.
Tell me about a time you had to manage multiple priorities at once.
Describe a situation where you had to solve a problem with limited information.
Tell me about a time you made a mistake at work or school and how you handled it.
Describe a time you disagreed with a decision and what you did about it.
Tell me about a time you had to explain a complex idea to someone.
Describe a situation where you had to adapt to a big change.
Tell me about a time you had to meet a tight deadline.
Describe a time you had to persuade someone to see things your way.
Tell me about a time you led a project or initiative.
Describe a situation where you supported a teammate who was struggling.
Tell me about a time you had to deal with an unhappy customer or stakeholder.
Describe a time you identified a problem before anyone else noticed it.
Tell me about a time you improved a process or way of working.
Describe a situation where you took ownership of a task from start to finish.
Tell me about a time you had to work with someone very different from you.
Describe a time you had to balance quality with speed.
Tell me about a time you had to prioritize your tasks under pressure.
Describe a situation where you had to handle confidential or sensitive information.
Tell me about a time you showed leadership without having a formal title.
Describe a time you had to motivate yourself when you did not feel like working.
Tell me about a time you had to give feedback to someone else.
Describe a situation where you had to quickly build trust with someone.
Tell me about a time you had to say no to someone.
Describe a time when you had to handle an unexpected challenge.
Tell me about a time you changed your approach after realizing your first plan was not working.
Describe a situation where you took initiative without being asked.
